name: Tapgasm
description:
NOTE THIS IS IN TESTING : VERSION 1
+ You can click on the buttons to fulfill orders and have your Toy Vibe
+ The Upgrade screen is work in progress and will not function nor will it let you return, just refresh page for now
+ Don't click on buttons past the entry of 5 commands / the order or it will crash (I'll update it tomorrow its quite late)
+ Web Audio function will break if you change page views whilst playing, you will come back to a Black Screen, just reload page for now :)

I appreciate you checking out it's potential :)

You run a Bar. Serving the Gobo's of the land. Remember their Order and give them a happy end to set them on their way. Screw up their order and screwing will be the last thing you do as they damage you and your Bar.

Keep them happy and more Patrons will come, as well as you if you have a Lovense enabled Toy.

Just connect your Toy to the Lovense CONNECT app and the Game will take care of the rest, no QR codes or anything else to type in.
